abstracts.cdata!:
The First Highway Sector Project's
            main emphasis will be on upgrading sections of the
            Trans-Yugoslav highway (TYH) which carries heavy
            international traffic as well as Yugoslavia's
            inter-regional traffic, rehabilitating existing
            infrastructure, and improving maintenance. It will
            consolidate institution building efforts with particular
            reference to investment and maintenance planning, road user
            charges, and inter-Republican coordination. The loan will
            also finance the preparation of nationwide programs for road
            and bridge rehabilitation and maintenance, as well as staff
            training programs and equipment for road organizations.
